div.p: The datasets analysed in this paper are available in the 20CRv2c repository: https://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/thredds/catalog/Datasets/20thC_ReanV2c /Dailies/gaussian/monolevel/catalog.html; in the COBE-SST2 repository: https://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/thredds/catalog/Datasets/COBE/catalog.html; in the ERA20CM repository: https://apps.ecmwf.int/datasets/data/era20cm/; in the CERA20C repository: https://apps.ecmwf.int/datasets/data/cera20c/; in the CMIP5 repository: https://esgf-node.llnl.gov/projects/cmip5/; and in the Large Ensemble Community Project repository: http://www.cesm.ucar.edu/projects/community-projects/LENS/data-sets.html.
